@bummm26 

In your code

```html
<script src="jquery-1.8.3.min"></script>
```
should be 
```html
<script src="jquery-1.8.3.min.js"></script>
```

and
```js
document.getElmentById('main')
```
should be
```js
document.getElementById('main')
```

等我加上海南诸岛就[公开发布](https://github.com/echarts-maps/echarts-china-misc-js):

步骤是这样的：

1. 把 china.json 才开成各个省市
2. 把各大区的geojson 合并，抹去内部边界
3. 再把各大区合成 china.json.
Thanks for the contribution!! The dist files should be excluded in the pull request

You will have the same problem if you have horizontal legend. I always use horizontal legend and with scroll type. This way the legend will not overlay the chart BUT you will not have all the legend options available at once.

Code:
```javascript
legend: {
    type: 'scroll',
    orient: 'horizontal'
}
```

![capturar](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/20660551/37279079-9d6a8a86-25e1-11e8-8188-296d28cbdbf5.PNG)

As you can see in the image, you will always have the same height for the legend and, at least form me, is easier to manipulate. Despite this, I think you are right. This is just the way I use the legend in order to avoid your problem.

然后，出现了新的问题：
1. 对节点进行拖拽，即使节点已经fixed，当放开时，还是会重新计算位置，我认为，如果节点的fixed为true，那么用户将其拖拽到哪里，它就应该固定在哪里
2. 无法通过外部设置 friction 和 变化因子（0.992），以及是否稳定的阈值（0.01），当前的设置会导致需要经过比较长的时间，才能进入稳定状态

@Ovilia Hi,Echarts针对这个普遍的共性问题有什么解决方案吗？

Hi. That is the old version of echarts and Id on't even know if they maintain that version.

You can try to use the new version and see the docs. I will leave you two links:

- [Theme's download page](http://echarts.baidu.com/download-theme.html)
- [Theme builder](http://echarts.baidu.com/theme-builder/)

In the second link you can see and try all default themes and build your own if you want.

how to add legent model

參考: [https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/issues/4906](https://github.com/ecomfe/echarts/issues/4906)

Vue-echarts 的方法:
在原始 component (Echarts.vue) 內加上這個 method 即可。

```javascript
 getOptions (){
      return [this.chart.getOption().dataZoom[0].startValue, this.chart.getOption().dataZoom[0].endValue]
 }
```

然後去呼叫他就好。
`require('echarts/lib/component/dataZoom');` 即可。
min max 应设置成 number。
